Articles.Content:
Your mission:  collide mystery goo into the surface of the moon at the maximum possible speed.  Our scientists are interested in the results.

You can use the F3 menu to check maximum speed reached even if it varies slightly from the indicated surface speed the moment before impact.  

My record so far is 18,495 m/s.  My strategy was to launch with the moon directly overhead and not turn.  

A score of 20,000 m/s wins.
tried this challenge, got 48103m/s  hope the video of it embeds properly
